summary:
This is the Ghorzas Armor by atomec
The heavy armor properties are like the orcish armor but the weight is slightly lower.
The light armor properties are like a glass armor.
The armor is made by orcish blacksmithing


I love texturing and adding things to armor and enjoy seeing others happy :) please let me know
descriptionHtml:
This is the Ghorzas Armor by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2118592]atomec[/url]
The heavy armor properties are like the orcish armor but the weight is slightly lower.
The light armor properties are like a glass armor.
The armor is made by orcish blacksmithing


I love texturing and adding things to armor and enjoy seeing others happy :) please let me know what you think


Required http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?
author: Danikitty
